programme.title: Murder Up North: Sievers And The Deadly Love
programme.desc: Ina Behrendsen is devastated when she discovers the beaten, dead body of her lover, Leo Fischer on the beach. The murder weapon? Ina’s own car jack. Yet as Sievers delves deeper into the case, the suspicions begins to shift to a wild group of youngsters.

programme.title: Our Children
programme.desc: A doctor brings a boy to Belgium and raises him as his own. When the boy reaches manhood, he gets married and starts his own family, but he still relies on the doctor, his adoptive father. When trouble strikes his family, dependence turns into domination.

programme.title: It Can't Be Real
programme.desc: A sobering film about moving on from childhood traumas – jazz singer Leyla grew up in a broken and dysfunctional family. A chance encounter with a mysterious photographer Murat unhinges her deep-seated pessimism in life and teaches her how to love again.

programme.title: Games People Play
programme.desc: An old group of friends gathers to celebrate Mitzi’s surprise birthday party over a nostalgic weekend at an idyllic seaside villa – just like they used to do as teenagers. Mitzi sets off a game that brings old feelings and power dynamics to the surface.

programme.title: My Son
programme.desc: When photographer Marlene's son Jason faces a life-altering skateboarding accident, their journey to healing takes unexpected turns. As they travel from Berlin to Switzerland, Jason slowly convinces his mother that life takes detours.

programme.title: Murder Up North: Sievers And the Sleepless Nights
programme.desc: Jen Hansen’s death seems by all accounts to be the tragic result of a deadly robbery. However, Sievers suspects that there is foul play afoot as his investigation unearths the skeletons in the pilot’s closet involving his brother and lover.

programme.title: Man And A Baby
programme.desc: Dad (Antti) is left alone with a newborn after the mom (Pia) decides motherhood is not her thing. Single dad tries to survive alone in "women's world" and keep the baby and himself alive.

programme.title: The Apple of My Eye
programme.desc: Elise is beautiful, funny, and blind. Theo is a seducer but a loser. They love music. But when they meet in the elevator, it's hate at first sight.

programme.title: The Uninvited Guest

programme.title: The Key Witness
programme.desc: BKA bodyguard Jan Schäfer must protect Fiona Weibel, a key witness for the International Tribunal of the Law of the Sea. With Weiber having insider knowledge of a Swiss shipping company's illicit activities, a game of cat and mouse over her life begins.

programme.title: The Black Minutes

programme.desc: Asta is born with no magical power in a magic world. He aims to be the Wizard King to prove his own strength.

programme.title: Games People Play
programme.desc: An old group of friends gathers to celebrate Mitzi’s surprise birthday party over a nostalgic weekend at an idyllic seaside villa – just like they used to do as teenagers. Mitzi sets off a game that brings old feelings and power dynamics to the surface.

programme.title: Murder Up North: Sievers And the Sleepless Nights
programme.desc: Jen Hansen’s death seems by all accounts to be the tragic result of a deadly robbery. However, Sievers suspects that there is foul play afoot as his investigation unearths the skeletons in the pilot’s closet involving his brother and lover.

programme.title: The Apple of My Eye
programme.desc: Elise is beautiful, funny, and blind. Theo is a seducer but a loser. They love music. But when they meet in the elevator, it's hate at first sight.

programme.title: The Key Witness
programme.desc: BKA bodyguard Jan Schäfer must protect Fiona Weibel, a key witness for the International Tribunal of the Law of the Sea. With Weiber having insider knowledge of a Swiss shipping company's illicit activities, a game of cat and mouse over her life begins.

programme.title: A Dose Of Happiness
programme.desc: Vesala’s search for happiness led her into an early marriage and a 3-year-old daughter. After her marriage fails, she and her daughter are brought down a path that leads to hell and back, one which brings her through drugs, fall, fear and redemption.

programme.title: The Black Minutes
programme.desc: Vicente Rangel, a musician turned detective, embarks on a police case to catch a murderer of girls in a corrupt oil town on the Gulf of Mexico.

programme.title: Wars
programme.desc: Following in her father’s footsteps, and yearning to fill the existential emptiness within her, 20-year-old Emma decides to join the army. In an environment of harsh discipline and repressive rules, Emma unexpectedly falls in love with her superior.

programme.title: Draupadi
programme.desc: Draupadi’s disrobing scene from the timeless epic, Mahabharat, is being shot on a film set. The male director, in the name of art, pushes his boundaries blurring the line between fiction and reality.

programme.title: What's for Dinner, Mom?
programme.desc: Sisters Tae and Yo return to their childhood home and discover a box of recipes and letters from their late Japanese mother. As Tae uncovers her mother’s hidden struggles, she journeys to Taiwan to retrace her past through memory and food.

programme.title: Jeanny: The Fifth Girl
programme.desc: In a picturesque tiny town near Vienna, young girls have been vanishing without a trace for years. Jeanny has just fallen in love with a mysterious man. But when she notices signs of a dark side in him, she becomes suspicious. Will she be the next victim?

programme.title: Empty Nets
programme.desc: Amir loves Narges and Narges loves Amir. But their hopes and dreams for a life together collide head on with the web of tradition, corruption, and social hierarchy that continues to rule over the lives of a new generation in Iran.

programme.title: Train Driver's Diary
programme.desc: As Ilija nears retirement, his record of unintentional deaths as a train driver weighs heavy. His adopted son, Sima, fears following in his footsteps. But as days pass without incident, Ilija's determination to ensure Sima's success takes a dark turn.

programme.title: Hard Luck
programme.desc: A family comes to the funeral of their beloved grandfather. After the burial it turns out that the numbers grandfather always bet at the lottery just won big, but the winning ticket was buried with him. The race for the buried ticket begins.

programme.title: 3 Meters Above The Sky
programme.desc: An upper middle class good girl falls for a bad boy on the wrong side of the tracks. It is a first love that is at once passionate and tempestuous. Released in Spain in 2010, it was a major box office hit.

programme.title: Homicide Unit Istanbul: The Final Passenger
programme.desc: Inspector Mehmet investigates the death of a German businessman and his cab driver in a Turkish seaside town. What initially looks like a deadly robbery turns out to be the precision work of a killer. But which of the two victims was the victim?
